data.name: RPG Maker MV - Spanish Guitar Strings
data.detailed_description:
Spanish guitar is famous for its fast-paced and skilled finger-work, a technique that adds undertones of complexity and passion to each of its songs.

Composed by Murray Atkinson, Spanish Guitar Strings is a set of 14 music themes that covers everything from passionate romance to quick duels and beyond. Songs include other traditional Spanish instruments, resulting in authentic-sounding material that's sure to bring forth some of that flamenco flair.

This pack contains:
  • 14 unique music themes.
  • Music for battle, romance, exploration and more!
  • Royalty free music to use in your commercial and non-commercial RPG Maker MV projects.

data.short_description: Spanish Guitar Strings is a set of 14 music themes that covers everything from passionate romance to quick duels and beyond
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Arabic, Simplified Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: PC with 1.0GHz Intel® Pentium® III equivalent or higher processor
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1024x768 or better video resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit)
  • Additional Notes: Editor best in Desktop mode (Steam OS)
